page.title: 09Home Life 1
page.content: I rose about 9.ooa.m.because it was the weekend.Then I mixed up a gallon of calves' milk for Kevie, my pet calf.(Kevie was bought to replace a dead calf but then the dead calf's mother died.So I was pleased to get Kevie to look after. She is a Hereford Friesian cross and she is black,brown and white.)The milk is a mixture of warm water and milk powder.I get the powder in the new shed and the water in the kitchen. After that I went round the sheep in three fields on my bike to see if there were any on their backs.If they stay on their backs they blow up and die.But there weren't any.Then I had my breakfast of bacon on toast and juice.
